A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
For the past 30+ years it has been a crime to mention SW and bad movie in the same sentence... 
until today. 

This is the first time I have felt compelled to write a review about my beloved SW franchise and was saddened\, but not surprised\, to see I'm not alone.

Simply too long\, plot holes galore\, weak cast\, and a "galaxy of the guardians" flavor made this film unwatchable (literally) .

I'm sure my Leia buns are politically incorrect and demeaning to my fellow females but they are my only hope from a SW not long ago.......
